argumentText:
ARGUMENT
j

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1st ` R ) = ( 1st ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ran ( 1st ` R ) = ran ( 1st ` R ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_idlss | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> I C_ ran ( 1st ` R ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2 | #P_igenval | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I C_ ran ( 1st ` R ) ) -> ( R IdlGen I ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | I C_ j } ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( R IdlGen I ) = |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | I C_ j } ) |
| 6 |  | #P_intmin | |- ( I e. ( Idl ` R ) -> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | I C_ j } = I ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> |^| { j e. ( Idl ` R ) | I C_ j } = I ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( R e. RingOps /\ I e. ( Idl ` R ) ) -> ( R IdlGen I ) = I ) |
